EmailTemplate.name: AWS_Cold_Nurture.AWS_Cold_Nurture_Email_3
EmailTemplate.subject: Leverage the elasticity of the public cloud.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-and-aws/cost-optimization-with-aws?utm_campaign=70157000001bYQKAA2]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you in the process of migrating to the cloud? Or, have you already migrated but wonder how you'll minimize cost and assure performance in the long-term, now that your migration is complete? Wherever you are in your cloud journey, Turbonomic can help.
Check out our Cost Optimization with AWS whitepaper <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-and-aws/cost-optimization-with-aws?utm_campaign=70157000001bYQKAA2]]> which explores how you can most effectively execute your migration to AWS and optimize your cloud strategy post-migration.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-and-aws/cost-optimization-with-aws?utm_campaign=70157000001bYQKAA2]]>
Turbonomic's autonomic decision-engine is the only platform where self-managed applications assure their performance autonomously through software and by software with minimal human intervention.
Take a closer look. Download a free trial today. <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial?utm_campaign=70157000001bYQKAA2]]>
Best, Team Turbonomic
